movie.title: Hocus Pocus
movie.description_intro: Inspired by the paranormal stories of opera veteran Master Sheng (Ching-Ying Lam), an opera troupe, which includes the daring actor Kuei (Wei Tung), trick each other with ghostly stories and horror tricks. The troupe is repulsed by the overly-confident opera actor Chia (Ho Kai Law); therefore, they play the ultimate ghost trick on him. When Chia finds out, he confronts the troupe, resulting them in keeping a distance from each other. However, the troupe's troubles worsen when their opera stage is haunted by a mischievous and restless ghost (Yuet Sang Chin).
movie.description_full: Inspired by the paranormal stories of opera veteran Master Sheng (Ching-Ying Lam), an opera troupe, which includes the daring actor Kuei (Wei Tung), trick each other with ghostly stories and horror tricks. The troupe is repulsed by the overly-confident opera actor Chia (Ho Kai Law); therefore, they play the ultimate ghost trick on him. When Chia finds out, he confronts the troupe, resulting them in keeping a distance from each other. However, the troupe's troubles worsen when their opera stage is haunted by a mischievous and restless ghost (Yuet Sang Chin).

movies.title: Gingerclown
movies.summary: In 1983, a group of high school kids break into an abandoned amusement park only to realize it's overrun with monsters.
movies.description_full: In 1983, a group of high school kids break into an abandoned amusement park only to realize it's overrun with monsters.
movies.synopsis: In 1983, a group of high school kids break into an abandoned amusement park only to realize it's overrun with monsters.

movies.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
movies.title_english: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
movies.title_long: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World (2012)
movies.summary: An asteroid named "Matilda" is on a collision course towards Earth and in three weeks the world will come to an absolute end. What would you do if your life and the world were doomed? One man decides to spend his time searching for his long lost love from high school during the coming catastrophe.
movies.description_full: An asteroid named "Matilda" is on a collision course towards Earth and in three weeks the world will come to an absolute end. What would you do if your life and the world were doomed? One man decides to spend his time searching for his long lost love from high school during the coming catastrophe.

movies.title: The Prince and the Pauper: The Movie
movies.title_english: The Prince and the Pauper: The Movie
movies.title_long: The Prince and the Pauper: The Movie (2007)
movies.summary: A modern day telling of the Mark Twain classic, The Prince and the Pauper.
movies.description_full: A modern day telling of the Mark Twain classic, The Prince and the Pauper.
movies.synopsis: A modern day telling of the Mark Twain classic, The Prince and the Pauper.

movies.title: Better Living Through Chemistry
movies.summary: A strait-laced pharmacist's uneventful life spirals out of control when he starts an affair with a trophy-wife customer who takes him on a joyride involving sex, drugs and possibly murder.
movies.description_full: A strait-laced pharmacist's uneventful life spirals out of control when he starts an affair with a trophy-wife customer who takes him on a joyride involving sex, drugs and possibly murder.
